issue.title: 100% CPU usage when dedalus is imported into an interactive shell

content.raw:
Hi Josh, I'm seeing this too, but I think I've narrowed it down to being an MPI/mpi4py issue.  That is, I also get the process pinned at 100% if I just open an interactive pythons session and do
 
```
#!python

from mpi4py import MPI
```

without touching Dedalus.  Can you check if that's causing it on your end?  

Also it looks like there's a closed issue regarding this on the mpi4py repo, and they seem to think it's an underlying issue with some MPI versions:

https://bitbucket.org/mpi4py/mpi4py/issues/34/100-cpu-utilization-after-import
